games.summary: Julius Randle had 19 points, 11 rebounds and 10 assists in his 15th career triple-double, and the Minnesota Timberwolves beat the winless Brooklyn Nets 125-109 on Monday night. Donte DiVincenzo scored 25 points, Jaden McDaniels finished with 22 and Rudy Gobert added 15 points and 12 rebounds for the Timberwolves, who won their two straight.
blurbs: 🆕 Noah Clowney (BKN) made his first start of the season. 32 min, 15 pts.
📋 Tyrese Martin (BKN) made just his 2nd start this season. 12 pts, 3 reb.
📋 Mike Conley (MIN) made just his 4th start this season. 9 pts, 3 reb.

games.summary: Giannis Antetokounmpo made a 17-foot buzzer-beating jumper to give the Milwaukee Bucks a 117-115 victory over the short-handed Indiana Pacers on Monday night. Kyle Kuzma added 15 points to help the Bucks win for the third time in four games, taking the first of four scheduled regular season matchups against a Central Division rival it has faced 22 times since the start of the 2023-24 season.
blurbs: 📋 Jarace Walker (IND) made just his 4th start this season. 18 pts, 8 reb.

games.summary: Jusuf Nurkic dropped in a putback with 0.6 seconds remaining and the Utah Jazz overcame a double-digit, second-half deficit to beat the Boston Celtics 105-103 on Monday night. Keyonte George scored a season-high 31 points, and Lauri Markkanen added 20 points and nine rebounds to help the Jazz end a three-game losing streak.
blurbs: 📋 Josh Minott (BOS) made just his 5th start this season. 2 pts, 6 reb.
📋 Taylor Hendricks (UTAH) made just his 2nd start this season. 2 pts, 3 reb.
📋 Jusuf Nurkic (UTAH) made just his 2nd start this season. 11 pts, 11 reb.

games.summary: Karl-Anthony Towns scored a season-high 33 points and grabbed 13 rebounds, leading the New York Knicks to a 119-102 victory over the Washington Wizards on Monday night. Jalen Brunson and OG Anunoby each added 16 points, and Jordan Clarkson scored 15 off the bench.
blurbs: 📋 Landry Shamet (NY) made just his 2nd start this season. 11 pts, 5 reb.

games.summary: Amen Thompson scored a season-high 27 points, Alperen Sengun added 26 points and 11 rebounds and the Houston Rockets outlasted the Dallas Mavericks for a 110-102 victory on Monday night. Washington missed a 3-pointer before Josh Okogie scored his first points of the game with two free throws that pushed the lead to 107-102 with a minute to go.
blurbs: 📋 Max Christie (DAL) made just his 4th start this season. 17 pts, 4 reb.

games.summary: MEMPHIS, Tenn. -- — Cade Cunningham scored 19 of his 33 points in the fourth quarter and the Detroit Pistons held off the Memphis Grizzlies 114-106 on Monday night.
blurbs: 🆕 Isaiah Stewart (DET) made his first start of the season. 34 min, 26 pts.

games.summary: Nikola Jokic scored a season-high 34 points and had 14 assists, Aaron Gordon added 20 points and the Denver Nuggets never trailed in a 130-124 victory over the Sacramento Kings on Monday night. Jokic, who opened the season with four straight triple-doubles, grabbed a season-low four rebounds but has recorded at least a double-double in the first six games.
blurbs: 📋 Russell Westbrook (SAC) made just his 3rd start this season. 26 pts, 12 reb.

games.summary: PORTLAND, Ore. Deni Avdija had 33 points for the Blazers, who had their three-game winning streak snapped.
blurbs: 📋 Jake LaRavia (LAL) made just his 3rd start this season. 11 pts, 5 reb.
🆕 Dalton Knecht (LAL) made his first start of the season. 23 min, 8 pts.

games.summary: Andrew Wiggins scored 17 points and Kel’el Ware added 16 to help the Heat end a two-game losing streak and win on the road for the second time in five games. James Harden scored 29 points and Kawhi Leonard added 27 as the Clippers lost at home for the first time in four games this season.
blurbs: 📋 Pelle Larsson (MIA) made just his 4th start this season. 7 pts, 1 reb.
